title: The Prophecy of the Awakened
goal: Kaelen and Elara discover an ancient prophecy that names him and foreshadows the rising darkness.

beats.summary: Elara, now convinced, directs Kaelen to a hidden, heavily guarded text or artifact that speaks of a cyclical darkness.
They decipher a prophecy that explicitly mentions an 'Awakened Sage' returning to confront a 'Whispering Blight' that rises from ancient slumber.
Kaelen realizes his role is not merely to understand, but to actively confront and potentially seal the Blight once more.
